oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hendrick Beren
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: About Hendrik Beren, an employee of Mr Willmott, and some words given by him. 1) Note on the inside of the front cover of Book VII-1: '(on pp.6046 1-5 a little information, and a few words obtained in March /76 from a servant [Hendrick Beren] of Mr H. Willmot's [spelt 'Willmott' elsewhere] of mixed Griqua, Hottentot, and Makatees descent.)', 2) This story is found in Book VII-1.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Personal history of Hendrick Beren and some words
